channel.title: I need help making a client
channel.description:
I want to make a client will anyone help me? :confused: Ok I made some pics on ms paint (All edited not real) I wanted them to look like this:
[b]This is my loading pic:[/b] [IMG]http://i180.photobucket.com/albums/x303/mystickid2k6/Loadingpic.jpg[/img]
[b]This is my home pic or w/e:[/b] [IMG]http://i180.photobucket.com/albums/x303/mystickid2k6/MyownclientIdea.jpg[/img]
[b]This is my logging in pic:[/b] [IMG]http://i180.photobucket.com/albums/x303/mystickid2k6/loggingin.jpg[/img]
That and I am making Mupescape v2 pretty sure most of you heard of Mupescape v1, anyway if anyone have a good server source for me (has skillcapes) and is easy to edit please post a download link for me thanks :D [b]I know Most of you people are going to tell me to go to rs2 server downloads and download some server from there but they don't got the right ones I'm looking for.[/b]

item.title: I need help making a client
item.dc:creator: @Mupescape Mupescape
item.description:
@Mupescape wrote:

I want to make a client will anyone help me?
Ok I made some pics on ms paint (All edited not real) I wanted them to look like this:

This is my loading pic:

Loadingpic.jpg827×616

This is my home pic or w/e:

MyownclientIdea.jpg936×616

This is my logging in pic:

loggingin.jpg936×616

That and I am making Mupescape v2 pretty sure most of you heard of Mupescape v1, anyway if anyone have a good server source for me (has skillcapes) and is easy to edit please post a download link for me thanks
I know Most of you people are going to tell me to go to rs2 server downloads and download some server from there but they don’t got the right ones I’m looking for.

Read full topic
